snippet.title: SCP: Nemesi | Steam Early Access Trailer | Wishlist now!
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2532230/SCP_Nemesi/

SCP: Nemesi is a multiplayer survival-horror game where one player takes on the role of the SCP (anomalous creatures, each with its own abilities and appearance), and the other four players play as Humans, each with their own personal goals and tasks that may branch into different paths.

Key Features:
- The Humans' visibility is severely limited by a thick fog, making it difficult to see far ahead. Blinking at regular intervals may cause them to miss something crucial...

- Each Human has a unique set of tasks to complete before they can escape. There's no need to rely on teammates to achieve these objectives, and only when a player accomplishes all their tasks can they make their escape.

- Explore maps inspired by everyday locations from various eras around the Earth. These meticulously designed non-procedural maps feature intricate pathways and hidden passages, challenging players to learn layouts and navigate effectively, which is crucial to their success.

- Each SCP featured in the game closely adheres to the SCP Lore, both in appearance and abilities. To set this game apart from other SCP titles, both lesser-known SCPs and intriguing original creations will be featured as the game evolves!

- Prepare for the unexpected with the presence of Environmental SCPs, AI-controlled entities that introduce unique challenges during each match. Be warned! While some are friendly, others may not be...
